title: 160. Why Everybody Who Doesn’t Hate Bitcoin Loves It
description: Thinking of Bitcoin as just a digital currency is like thinking about the Internet as just e-mail. Its potential is much more exciting than that.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Thinking of Bitcoin as just a digital currency is like thinking about the Internet as just e-mail. Its potential is much more exciting than that.
